p.s: Bianca is aan 18-year-old German volunteer who worked in an Education Center for children in a slum of Delhi.
She says that the children were the best part of this volunteer trip.
She is surprised how happy these children were, even if they live in these poor conditions.
She had never experienced such thankful, happy lovely and curious children.
Not even in the schools and kindergardens she used to work.
She didn't only have good moments.
Of course, there are frustrating moments once in a while, but for her, these days were the best days in her life.
